command.remark: really finds the input connected to the iPod

argument.name: freq
argument.description: (6 digits) ****.** kHz at AM band (>050000 is AM.) ****.** MHz at FM band (<050000 is FM.)

command.remark: Select INPUT source NET/USB and start USB Playback
Select MULTI ZONE-2 source NET/USB and start USB Playback
Select MULTI ZONE-3 source NET/USB and start USB Playback

command.name: Panel button (except master vol.) control lock on
Panel button and master vol. control lock on
Panel buttum and master vol. control lock off
